Title: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to submit a detailed report of proposed savings and investment initiatives within the executive budget
Summary: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to submit a detailed report of proposed savings and investment initiatives within the executive budget.
LawCode: Amd ยง22, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to submit a detailed report of proposed savings and investment initiatives within the executive budget
